title: India, UK conduct scale-up study of AI-enabled mental health tool for young girls
description: LONDON, Feb 18 :  Researchers from India and the UK are collaborating on a new 5.3 million pounds project to adapt and scale-up an artificial intelligence (AI) enabled digital mental health programme for adolescent girls living in Indian villages. The international project, unveiled to coincide with the AI Impact Summit in New Delhi this week, involves partners from Imperial College London,Â University of Cambridge, Tata Institute of Social Sciences and Milaan Foundation, alongside community-based organisations. The team will work to develop and […]
content:

title: India among key hubs for AI innovation, company deepening India partnerships: NVIDIA
description: NEW DELHI, Feb 18 : India, with its deep base of developers, startups and partners, has become one of the most important hubs for AI innovation, said NVIDIA managing director for South Asia, Vishal Dhupar, while highlighting that the company was working closely with technology leaders across the country to accelerate transformation and supercharge growth. NVIDIA’s diversity of partnerships is critical as AI is not a single product, nor a lone one-off breakthrough, he said, likening Artificial Intelligence to a […]

title: EU, India can forge strong AI partnership: Member of European Parliament
description: NEW DELHI, Feb 18: Europe and India can build a strong partnership in artificial intelligence (AI) by focusing on real-world deployment rather than engaging in a technological arms race, Brando Benifei, Member of the European Parliament, said on Wednesday. “The EU and India can have a strong partnership on AI. Why? Because we both concentrate on use cases of AI, on deployment of AI,” Benifei said at the India AI Impact Summit 2026. He said both sides share a similar […]
content: NEW DELHI, Feb 18: Europe and India can build a strong partnership in artificial intelligence (AI) by focusing on real-world deployment rather than engaging in a technological arms race, Brando Benifei, Member of the European Parliament, said on Wedn... [2824 chars]

title: Be proficient in AI tools to lead next tech wave: Google DeepMind CEO tells India's youth
description: NEW DELHI, Feb 18: India’s youth could emerge as the vanguard of the AI transformation if they fully embrace and master new Artificial Intelligence tools, Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis said on Wednesday. Addressing India AI Impact Summit, he urged students to become proficient in emerging AI tools to unlock their full potential. Responding to a question on the role India can play amid resource constraints but abundant talent, Hassabis said he was “incredibly impressed” by the energy in the […]
content:

title: India keen to diversify crude oil, coking coal sources; eyes high-quality US supplies: Goyal
description: NEW DELHI, Feb 18 : India wants to diversify its sources of crude oil and coking coal and would “love” to source high-quality coking coal from the US, Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal said on Wednesday. He also said that the US can provide certain goods that India needs desperately for its economic growth. These goods can include Graphics Processing Units (GPUs) for Artificial Intelligence applications, equipment for data centres and high performance computing. India, he said, can manufacture […]
content:

title: UK to Force Tech Firms to Take Down Abusive Images in 48 Hours
description: The UK government has proposed rules that would require tech companies to remove abusive images from their sites within 48 hours, weeks after X users flooded the social media platform with thousands of pictures of undressed women they’d generated with the company’s artificial intelligence tool.

title: McLaren launches AI tool that reviews CT scans for heart attack risk
description: McLaren Health Care is using an artificial intelligence tool to review Michiganders' medical charts and imaging tests to spot signs of heart disease.
content:
Grand Blanc-based McLaren Health Care announced it has launched an artificial intelligence tool to spot early signs of heart disease in patients' CT scans.
The new screening program is in partnership with Bunkerhill Health. McLaren says it is the fir... [4495 chars]

title: AI Is Already Taking Jobs From Young US Workers, Fed's Michael Barr Warns
description: Artificial intelligence may already be displacing some of America's youngest workers, according to Federal Reserve Governor Michael S. Barr.
content:
Artificial intelligence may already be displacing some of America's youngest workers, according to Fed Governor Michael Barr.

title: The value investor shuns AI
description: Einhorn's latest moves reflect his views on artificial intelligence and the market as a whole.
